name: Prince of Persia Classic
description:
The original action adventure game comes to the PlayStation®Network! Rescue the Princess from the clutches of the evil Jaffar in a re-make of the original 1989 action-adventure that redefined the genre. All set for the HD-era, this enhanced and updated version features new character designs, animations, visuals, and lighting effects!
Key Features:
Updated and enhanced for the HD-era.
 New content: Solve new puzzles and overcome new enemies in exciting one on one combat!
* Three game modes for all types of players: Normal mode, Time Attack, and Survival mode ensure replayability as well as accessibility for first time players to the franchise.
